mapper.sql: m.IMPORT_NO, m.LOCNO, m.OWNER_NO, m.IMPORT_TYPE, m.PO_TYPE, m.PO_NO, m.TRANS_NO, m.SUPPLIER_NO, m.ORDER_DATE, m.REQUEST_DATE, m.STATUS, m.CREATE_FLAG, m.IMPORT_REMARK, m.END_DATE, m.RECEIVE_TYPE, m.PAY_TYPE_NAME, m.ORDER_TYPE_NAME, m.LAY_TYPE, m.CLASS, m.ERROR_STATUS, m.CREATOR, m.CREATETM, m.EDITOR, m.EDITTM, m.SEND_FLAG, m.ORDER_END_DATE, m.WITH_CODE_FLAG, m.STOCK_TYPE, m.STOCK_VALUE, m.QUALITY, m.SAMPLE_RATE, m.SYS_NO, m.CO_NO, m.AUDITOR, m.AUDITTM, m.S_PO_NO, m.BUSINESS_TYPE,m.CREATORNAME,m.EDITORNAME,m.AUDITORNAME

vc.IMPORT_NO, vc.LOCNO, vc.OWNER_NO, vc.IMPORT_TYPE, vc.PO_TYPE, vc.PO_NO, vc.TRANS_NO, vc.SUPPLIER_NO, vc.ORDER_DATE, vc.REQUEST_DATE, vc.STATUS, vc.CREATE_FLAG, vc.IMPORT_REMARK, vc.END_DATE, vc.RECEIVE_TYPE, vc.PAY_TYPE_NAME, vc.ORDER_TYPE_NAME, vc.LAY_TYPE, vc.CLASS, vc.ERROR_STATUS, vc.CREATOR, vc.CREATETM, vc.EDITOR, vc.EDITTM, vc.SEND_FLAG, vc.ORDER_END_DATE, vc.WITH_CODE_FLAG, vc.STOCK_TYPE, vc.STOCK_VALUE, vc.QUALITY, vc.SAMPLE_RATE, vc.SYS_NO, vc.CO_NO, vc.AUDITOR, vc.AUDITTM, vc.S_PO_NO, vc.BUSINESS_TYPE,vc.CREATORNAME,vc.EDITORNAME,vc.AUDITORNAME

sql.if: and (sub1.import_no is not null or sub2.import_no is null)

mapper.select:
select SUM(nvl((select sum(nvl(d.po_Qty, 0)) from bill_im_import_dtl d where d.locno = A.locno and d.owner_no = A.owner_no and d.import_no = A.import_no), 0)) sumQty, SUM(nvl((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT box_no) FROM bill_im_import_dtl d WHERE d.import_no = A.import_no), 0)) boxNoQty, SUM(nvl((SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT box_no) FROM bill_im_import_dtl d WHERE d.import_no = A.import_no and d.receipt_qty != 0), 0)) receiptBoxNoQty from (
) A

select count(1) as s from (
) A

select count(distinct d.IMPORT_NO) as s from BILL_IM_IMPORT b left outer join BILL_IM_IMPORT_DTL d on b.IMPORT_NO = d.IMPORT_NO and b.LOCNO=d.LOCNO left outer join con_box cb on cb.locno=d.locno and d.box_no=cb.box_no left outer join con_box_dtl cbd on cb.locno=cbd.locno and cbd.box_no=cb.box_no left outer join item i on i.item_no = d.item_no left outer join brand br on i.brand_no = br.brand_no left outer join lookupdtl ld on ld.itemval = b.sys_no and ld.lookupcode = 'SYS_NO' and ld.systemid='21' left outer join supplier s on b.supplier_no = s.supplier_no where 1=1 and cb.status='0' and cbd.import_no!=' '
and (b.status='11' or b.status='12' or b.status='30')

select distinct t.supplierNo, t.supplierName from (SELECT distinct b.supplier_no supplierNo, s.supplier_name AS supplierName FROM bill_im_import b inner join SUPPLIER s on b.supplier_no = s.supplier_no WHERE b.locno = #{dto.locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.status in ('11', '12', '30') and b.business_type = '0'
union
SELECT distinct b.supplier_no supplierNo, s.store_name AS supplierName FROM bill_im_import b inner join store s on b.supplier_no = s.store_no WHERE b.locno = #{dto.locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and b.status in ('11', '12', '30') and b.business_type = '4') t
mapper.insert: insert into BILL_IM_IMPORT (IMPORT_NO, LOCNO, OWNER_NO, IMPORT_TYPE, PO_TYPE, PO_NO, TRANS_NO, SUPPLIER_NO, ORDER_DATE, REQUEST_DATE, STATUS, CREATE_FLAG, IMPORT_REMARK, END_DATE, RECEIVE_TYPE, PAY_TYPE_NAME, ORDER_TYPE_NAME, LAY_TYPE, CLASS, ERROR_STATUS, CREATOR, CREATETM, EDITOR, EDITTM, SEND_FLAG, ORDER_END_DATE, WITH_CODE_FLAG, STOCK_TYPE, STOCK_VALUE, QUALITY, SAMPLE_RATE, SYS_NO, CO_NO, AUDITOR, AUDITTM,S_PO_NO, BUSINESS_TYPE, CREATORNAME,EDITORNAME,AUDITORNAME) values (#{importNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{importRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{receiveType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{layType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{typeClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{orderEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{withCodeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stockValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sampleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{coNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{audittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},#{sPoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{editorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{auditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update BILL_IM_IMPORT
IMPORT_TYPE = #{importType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_TYPE = #{poType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PO_NO = #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
TRANS_NO = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
REQUEST_DATE = #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATE_FLAG = #{createFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
IMPORT_REMARK = #{importRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
RECEIVE_TYPE = #{receiveType,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PAY_TYPE_NAME = #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_TYPE_NAME = #{orderTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAY_TYPE = #{layType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CLASS = #{typeClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATETM = #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
EDITOR = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITTM = #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ORDER_END_DATE = #{orderEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
WITH_CODE_FLAG = #{withCodeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_TYPE = #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STOCK_VALUE = #{stockValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUALITY = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SAMPLE_RATE = #{sampleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SYS_NO = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CO_NO = #{coNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITTM = #{audittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
S_PO_NO = #{sPoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATORNAME = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EDITORNAME = #{editorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
AUDITORNAME = #{auditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where IMPORT_NO = #{importNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCNO = #{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
and status = #{uptStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update BILL_IM_IMPORT set IMPORT_TYPE = #{importType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_TYPE = #{poType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PO_NO = #{poNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TRANS_NO = #{transNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SUPPLIER_NO = #{supplierNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_DATE = #{orderDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REQUEST_DATE = #{requestDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, STATUS = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATE_FLAG = #{createFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, IMPORT_REMARK = #{importRemark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, END_DATE = #{endDate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RECEIVE_TYPE = #{receiveType,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PAY_TYPE_NAME = #{payTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_TYPE_NAME = #{orderTypeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAY_TYPE = #{layType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CLASS = #{typeClass,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ERROR_STATUS = #{errorStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATOR = #{creator,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATETM = #{createtm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, EDITOR = #{editor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITTM = #{edittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SEND_FLAG = #{sendFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ORDER_END_DATE = #{orderEndDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, WITH_CODE_FLAG = #{withCodeFlag,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_TYPE = #{stockType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STOCK_VALUE = #{stockValue,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUALITY = #{quality,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SAMPLE_RATE = #{sampleRate,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SYS_NO = #{sysNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CO_NO = #{coNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITOR = #{auditor,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITTM = #{audittm,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, S_PO_NO = #{sPoNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BUSINESS_TYPE = #{businessType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATORNAME = #{creatorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, EDITORNAME = #{editorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, AUDITORNAME = #{auditorName,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where IMPORT_NO = #{importNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and LOCNO = #{locno,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and OWNER_NO = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
